lead_paragraph: Baird Capital Partners Europe said on Monday that it had agreed to buy the Nigel Wright Group, a British recruiting agency, in a deal valuing that company at about £15 million, a person familiar with the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Baird Capital Partners Europe said Monday that it had agreed to buy Nigel Wright Group, a British recruiting agency. The deal values NGW at about £15 million, a person familiar with the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: Baird Capital to Buy Nigel Wright, a Recruiter

abstract: Baird Capital Partners Europe said Monday that it had agreed to buy Nigel Wright Group, a British recruiting agency. The deal values NGW at about £15 million, a person familiar with the matter told DealBook.
